headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Google Nexus 7 review & Develop conference roundup
text: This week Aleks Krotoski and Technology editor Charles Arthur take a close look at Google's Nexus 7 tablet and discuss a new 1m tech startup prize launched by London's Silicon Roundabout community.  Guardian Games correspondent Keith Stuart is joined by games journalist Christian Donlan to discuss Develop 2012, the UK's gaming conference which takes place annually in Brighton. Keith also meets some leading lights and new comers in the gaming community including Gaikai founder Dave Perry, David Braben the man behind the low-cost educational computer the Raspberry Pi, gaming legend Ian Livingstone and Simon Reid, the one man band behind the hit iOS game, New Star Soccer.
